pr_title: Set default cpu & memory requests on the jnlp container

timeline.message: No need to start Jenkins during unit tests
Set default cpu & memory requests on the jnlp container

timeline.bodyText: Without this workaround for fabric8io/kubernetes-client#2034, testOverridesFromYaml improperly fails when the if (jnlp.getResources() == null) gate is disabled in main sources: the actual CPU is 100m but this compares as equal to 200m!
timeline.author: jglick
